authSignIn.signInWithEmailLinkPlaceHolder: Press Go to sign-in with an email link.

homeParticipant.contactAdministrator: Please contact your administrator to get added to an assignment.

homeSelector.inactivityLogout:
You will soon be logged out for security purposes. Please click "Continue" if you wish to continue your session.
 Otherwise, you will be automatically logged out in { timeLeft } seconds.

gameTabs.introDescription: Learn how to play our games.
gameTabs.heartsAndFlowersDescription: Match the correct side to the hearts and flowers.
gameTabs.matrixReasoningDescription: Find the missing piece to complete the puzzle.
gameTabs.memoryGameDescription: Watch the squares light up. Remember the order and make the same pattern.
gameTabs.sameDifferentSelectionDescription: Find things that are the same about the shapes.
gameTabs.theoryOfMindDescription: Listen to the stories and answer the questions.
gameTabs.trogDescription: Listen to the words and choose the matching picture.
gameTabs.surveyDescriptionChild: Answer questions about your time at school.
gameTabs.surveyDescriptionParentPart1: This survey will take approximately 20-30 minutes to complete and will ask questions about your child.
gameTabs.surveyDescriptionParentPart2: This survey will take approximately 20-30 minutes to complete and will ask questions about your home and yourself.
gameTabs.surveyDescriptionTeacherPart1: This survey will take approximately 5-10 minutes to complete and asks about your background and beliefs about teaching.
gameTabs.surveyDescriptionTeacherPart2: This survey will take approximately 5-10 minutes to complete and asks questions about the classroom(s) you teach.
gameTabs.vocabDescription: Listen to the word and choose the matching picture.
gameTabs.roarInferenceDescription: Read the stories and answer the questions.

notFound.label: Return to Home.
notFound.sorry: Sorry, we could not find that page!

pageSignIn.login: Log in to access your dashboard
pageSignIn.adminPrompt: Are you an Admin? Click {action} to Sign in.

sentryForm.messagePlaceholder: What is the issue? What did you want to experience instead? Thank you for sharing.

settings.languageDescription: Select the language you want to use in the dashboard. This will ONLY change the language of the dashboard and surveys, not the tasks.
